object.description:
You can drink salt water without harm. In addition, you can spew a salty Vomit attack. The target takes no damage but must pass a Difficult (-10) Endurance Test or gain one Blinded Condition, and any metal armour they are wearing has its Armour Rating halved.
You skin is permanently covered with salty wet crust, and you must drink a pint of sea water every day or you gain a  a Fatigued Condition.
object.name: Brine Drinker

your Head Hit Location. Headwear only fits if specially crafted.

your Head Hit Location. Headwear only fits if specially crafted.

object.description: You have new eyes. Roll 1d100 to determine their Hit Location. Gain +1d10 I. If you have no I Characteristic, gain +3d10 I instead. All hits the the Hit Location with your new eyes inflict a Blinded Condition.
object.name: Clutch of Eyes

object.description: Your head to stretches in wide translucent folds around your swollen, glowing brain. Gain +1d10 Int.  If you have no Int Characteristic, gain +3d10 I instead.  All Head Hits cause a Critical Wound.
object.name: Massive Intelect

object.description: You suffer -20 to all Tests requiring you to hold something and -20 to Fel Tests. When escaping Grapple, if you succeed, you can use unit die number as SL.
object.name: Slippery Skin

object.description: With a successful Willpower Test, you can mentally communicate with any sentient creature within WP yards. If you succeed an Opposed Willpower Test, you can read creature's surface thoughts.
object.name: Telepathy
